sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-title>{{ post.title.rendered }}</v-card-title>
    <v-card-text> {{ post.content.rendered }} </v-card-text>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-textarea v-model="content" filled v-show="editMode"></v-textarea>
    </v-card-text>
    <!--COMMENTS SECTION-->
    <v-row rows="6">
      <v-col cols="4" v-for="commentEl in comments" :key="commentEl.id">
        <CommentCard
          style="background-color: gray; margin-left: 5px; height 20px; width: 100%"
          :post="commentEl"
        />
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-card-actions>
      <v-btn @click="showComment">Add Comment</v-btn
      ><v-btn :edit="editMode" v-show="editMode" @click="addComment"
        >Save Comment</v-btn
      >
    </v-card-actions>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import PostService from "@/services/PostService";
import CommentCard from "@/components/CommentCard";

export default {
  components: {
    CommentCard,
  },
  props: {
    comment: Object,
    post: Object,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      comments: [],
      editMode: false,
      content: this.content,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    showComment() {
      this.editMode = !this.editMode;
    },
    async addComment() {
      let res = await PostService.createComment({
        content: this.content,
        post: this.post.id,
      });
      console.log(res);
    },
  },
  async created() {
    this.comments = await PostService.getComments();
  },
};
</script>
